00037 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::InterfaceSupportsErrorInfo(REFIID riid)
00038 {
00039         static const IID* arr[] = 
00040         {
00041                 &IID_IMAS5
00042         };
00043 
00044         for (int i=0; i < sizeof(arr) / sizeof(arr[0]); i++)
00045         {
00046                 if (InlineIsEqualGUID(*arr[i],riid))
00047                         return S_OK;
00048         }
00049         return S_FALSE;
00050 }

00052 /*
00053  * Run the algorithm and report and save the results to a CHP file.
00054  */
00055 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::RunAbsoluteAnalysis(BSTR celFile, BSTR chpFile, BSTR cdfFile, VARIANT_BOOL* pVal)
00056 {
00057         std::string scelFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(celFile);
00058         std::string schpFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(chpFile);
00059         std::string scdfFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(cdfFile);
00060         std::string sbaselineFile;
00061 
00062         // Run the algorithm
00063         bool success = mas5.Execute(scelFile, sbaselineFile, scdfFile, schpFile);
00064         *pVal = (success == true ? VARIANT_TRUE : VARIANT_FALSE);
00065         return S_OK;
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*
00069  * Run the algorithm and report and save the results to a CHP file.
00070  */
00071 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::RunComparisonAnalysis(BSTR celFile, BSTR baselineFile, BSTR chpFile, BSTR cdfFile, VARIANT_BOOL* pVal)
00072 {
00073         std::string scdfFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(cdfFile);
00074         std::string scelFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(celFile);
00075         std::string schpFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(chpFile);
00076         std::string sbaselineFile = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(baselineFile);
00077 
00078         // Run the algorithm
00079         bool success = mas5.Execute(scelFile, sbaselineFile, scdfFile, schpFile);
00080         *pVal = (success == true ? VARIANT_TRUE : VARIANT_FALSE);
00081         return S_OK;
00082 }

00086  */
00087 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::get_Error(BSTR* pVal)
00088 {

00093 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::put_SaveToLegacyFile(VARIANT_BOOL newVal)
00094 {
00095         mas5.SaveToLegacyFile() = ( newVal == VARIANT_TRUE ? true : false);
00096         return S_OK;
00097 }

00099 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::put_AlgorithmParameterFile(BSTR newVal)
00100 {
00101     std::string fileName = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(newVal);
00102     MAS5ParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters(fileName.c_str(), mas5.AlgParameters());
00103     return S_OK;
00104 }
00105 
00106 STDMETHODIMP CMAS5::put_ReportControlsParameterFile(BSTR newVal)
00107 {
00108     std::string fileName = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(newVal);
00109     ExpressionControlsParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters(fileName.c_str(), mas5.ProbePairThreshold(), mas5.ReportControls());
00110     return S_OK;
00111 }
